channel.title: Patch v5.0.0: Gfx Revamp (pt1) + Bye Faction Rotations
channel.description:
## Major Gfx Revamp (Part 1)
**Early Access:** This is essentially a live beta test of our graphics revamp (part 1), that we're happy to share!
Mystic New (GIF):
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/580380189079502868/879307181999128626/mystic-anim.gif
Mystic Old:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/580380189079502868/879307206149943316/unknown.png
King New:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/580380189079502868/879621181559414784/unknown.png
King Old:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/580380189079502868/879621198592479252/unknown.png
**Part 1, Live Now:**
- Ground-up lighting/shading/particle revamps for every day/night/death room. - Added shadows, god rays and environmental dust. - Darker environment, but brighter focus points with better color differences. - Added some environmental texture upgrades. - HDR support. - Optimization - Should still have decent FPS! - **@ Veterans:** If you have the <Veteran> tag with the crystal *flair*, you got a visual upgrade: [https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/580380189079502868/879316269315276810/ezgif.com-gif-maker_1.gif](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/580380189079502868/879316269315276810/ezgif.com-gif-maker_1.gif) * Known bugs to be hotfixed: * Some areas have Bloom intensity too high, like Sellsword/Merc room. * Some areas are too dark (or the character is too dark). * Part 1 has "dev tweaks". Part 2 will have "*actual artist*" tweaks.
**Part 2+, Roadmap:**
1. Lighting is actually *too* dark right now: We will tweak this. 2. Camera angle improvements. 3. More textures (armor + weapons). 4. Reflective surfaces (armor/weapons/windows). 5. Additional prop varieties (like furniture). 6. Potential fixes for previously-disabled weapons+executions. 7. Better idle/sitting animations. 8. Significant optimization boost (baked lights).
_______
## Faction Rotations GONE!
We're back to *classic mode*, for now! üéâ
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/643778163402342420/879662484091441162/classicmodereturns.gif
In the future, we'll likely add optional rotation modes to *100% private* games, **if you really feel like an Unseen or Cult game, specifically.
_______
## Major Fixes
1. Fixed crash when typing `<` or `>` in chat. 2. Fixed some `<styles>` being revealed during select class card hovers. 3. Fixed buggy text selection (when trying to copy text from chat) - it should now work similarly to a text editor, where you can drag to select / double click to highlight the word / triple click to highlight the entire sentence. 4. Potentially fixed quest progression bug for executing players.
**These are early access fixes, at least working in Unity ‚Äî let us know if it worked for you!*
## Minor Improvements
1. Fixed some class card consistency issues, like with Marshal/Seeker's *Expose*. 2. Seems like *Voidstone of Corax* execution was missing an entire particle layer - fixed. 3. Fixed stacking text: The moment the player dies in an execution, we'll hide the name above their head (so both players' names don't jarble together). 4. Death reveals no longer **bold** the name of Neutral classes. 5. Tutorial night ability description has returned. 6. Made the names above your head prettier.
________________
## Hotfixes
This had some MAJOR changes, both front and backend -- here come the hotfixes (thanks for the awesome bug reports :clap: )!

  • Fixed several rooms having ‚Äúoverbloom‚Äù and misplaced dust particles.
  • Swapped out most old pixelated torch particles with the new style (more later).
  • Fixed bright graveyard (among other similar issues).
  • Fixed one of the dead room‚Äôs awkward camera positions.
  • Improved Sorc room‚Äôs lighting.
  • Made Sheriff‚Äôs room less ‚Äúorange‚Äù.
  • Fixed some random ultra-glowing of select parchments (which gave the Unseen table ‚Äúknife in parchment‚Äù a really cool shadowed-knife-glowing-hilt effect).
  • Hunter and Merc/Sellsword walls got a mini texture upgrade (placeholder).

Other Improvements

  • Fixed new player lobby ‚ÄúWelcome Screen‚Äù text placement.
  • Renamed lobby ‚ÄúKnowledgebase‚Äù tab to ‚ÄúLearn‚Äù
  • Hovering over a lobby friend button has less text overlap and more clarity.
  • Left lobby ‚ÄúPatch Notes banner‚Äù with link has returned.

Hotfix v5.0.0b

  • Fixed many things

Major Bug Fixes

  • Fixed some armor desyncs.
  • The floor is no longer swallowing players.

Minor Fixes

  • Fixed some light gaps in day scene walls/floors.
  • Fixed tutorial/dev/backer sword missing textures.
  • Fixed Abaddon Axe missing textures during execution.
  • Fixed missing trident weapon textures.
  • Fixed some minor issues with name selection chat button.
  • Additional optimization between game over and end screen.
  • Assassin class card tips now have clickable class links.
  • Less-awkward top-right lobby spacing between ‚ÄúLearn‚Äù and ‚ÄúCode of Conduct‚Äù.
  • Fixed some unsync‚Äôd Welcome Screen panels/buttons.
